00013 /*
00014  * Matrix support functions for filter classes
00015  *  Members of the Bayesian_filter_matrix namespace are used in the
00016  *  interface of Bayesian_filter and for internal operations.
00017  *  Be aware! These functions and their implemenation are more likely to change
00018  *  then those in Bayesian_filter.
00019  */
00020 
00021 /* Filter Matrix Namespace */
00022 namespace Bayesian_filter_matrix
00023 {
00024 
00025 
00026 /*
00027  * Assertion support
00028  */
00029 #ifndef NDEBUG
00030 void assert_isPSD (const SymMatrix &M);
00031 #else
00032 inline void assert_isPSD (const SymMatrix &M) {}
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 /*
00036  * Local support functions
00037  */
00038 bool isPSD (const SymMatrix &M);
00039 bool isSymmetric (const Matrix &M);
00040 void forceSymmetric (Matrix &M, bool bUpperToLower = false);
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * UdU' and LdL' and UU' Cholesky Factorisation and function
00044  * Very important to manipulate PD and PSD matrices
00045  *
00046  * Return values:
00047  *  Many algorithms return a value_type which is a reciprocal condition number
00048  *  These values are documented for each algorithm and are important way to
00049  *  determine the validity of the results
00050  */
00051 Vec::value_type UdUrcond (const Vec& d);
00052 RowMatrix::value_type UdUrcond (const RowMatrix& UD);
00053 RowMatrix::value_type UdUrcond (const RowMatrix& UD, std::size_t n);
00054 UTriMatrix::value_type UCrcond (const UTriMatrix& UC);
00055 SymMatrix::value_type UdUdet (const SymMatrix& UD);
00056 
00057 // In-place factorisations
00058 RowMatrix::value_type UdUfactor_variant1 (RowMatrix& M, std::size_t n);
00059 RowMatrix::value_type UdUfactor_variant2 (RowMatrix& M, std::size_t n);
00060 inline RowMatrix::value_type UdUfactor (RowMatrix& M, std::size_t n)
00061 {   return UdUfactor_variant2(M,n);
00062 }
00063 LTriMatrix::value_type LdLfactor (LTriMatrix& M, std::size_t n);
00064 UTriMatrix::value_type UCfactor (UTriMatrix& M, std::size_t n);
00065 
00066 // Copy factorisations
00067 RowMatrix::value_type UdUfactor (RowMatrix& UD, const SymMatrix& M);
00068 LTriMatrix::value_type LdLfactor (LTriMatrix& LD, const SymMatrix& M);
00069 UTriMatrix::value_type UCfactor (UTriMatrix& UC, const SymMatrix& M);
00070 
00071 // Factor manipulations
00072 bool UdUinverse (RowMatrix& UD);
00073 bool UTinverse (UTriMatrix& U);
00074 void UdUrecompose_transpose (RowMatrix& M);
00075 void UdUrecompose (RowMatrix& M);
00076 void UdUrecompose (SymMatrix& X, const RowMatrix& M);
00077 void UdUfromUCholesky (RowMatrix& U);
00078 void UdUseperate (RowMatrix& U, Vec& d, const RowMatrix& UD);
00079 void Lzero (RowMatrix& M);
00080 void Uzero (RowMatrix& M);
00081 
00082 /*
00083  * Functions using UdU factorisation:
00084  *  inverse of Positive Definate matrix returning rcond
00085  */
00086 SymMatrix::value_type UdUinversePDignoreInfinity (SymMatrix& M);
00087 SymMatrix::value_type UdUinversePD (SymMatrix& M);
00088 SymMatrix::value_type UdUinversePD (SymMatrix& M, SymMatrix::value_type& detM);
00089 SymMatrix::value_type UdUinversePD (SymMatrix& MI, const SymMatrix& M);
00090 SymMatrix::value_type UdUinversePD (SymMatrix& MI, SymMatrix::value_type& detM, const SymMatrix& M);
